backend/main.mo: Actor implementing product catalog, user profiles, orders, and admin‑restricted product management with access control and Stripe session integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, their related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their responsibilities for documentation or build analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with shared styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, global providers, and layout, including the admin products route.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state with add, update, remove, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines cart item types and helpers to compute totals and item counts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with about text, navigation links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright line.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the responsive site header with navigation, search, category filters, admin link logic, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Wraps pages with a shared header, footer, and main outlet container.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, details, price, and an add‑to‑cart button using card UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddProduct.ts: Mutation hook to add a product via the actor and refresh product and category queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Fetches the list of product categories from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Mutation hook to create an order with customer info, items, and total amount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Fetches a single order by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Retrieves a single product by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches the full product list from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with light/dark variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with store story, offerings, and artisan commitment text.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin-only form page for adding new products with image upload, validation, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, line totals, and navigation to checkout or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Collects customer details, creates orders, and handles login and payment flow before clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact information page showing email, phone, and address details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order status, customer info, items, and payment state based on a loaded order ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays a single product’s details with image, pricing, stock, and an add‑to‑cart action.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays a product listing page with search and category filtering and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentButton.tsx: Triggers creation of a Stripe checkout session and redirects the user while handling errors and order tracking.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentFailurePage: Updates an order as failed on load and offers retry or navigation options after a payment failure.
Admin-only form for configuring Stripe with secret keys and allowed countries using React Query.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentSuccessPage: Verifies Stripe session status, updates order payment to paid if successful, and redirects to the order page.
frontend/src/payments/useCreateCheckoutS: React Query mutation creating a Stripe checkout session via backend and returning the session URL.
frontend/src/storefront/filtersStore.ts: Zustand store managing product search text and selected category.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats a price in cents into a US dollar currency string.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product image references to generated image URLs, handling data URLs and external links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, listing existing admin product management features and one pending new feature request.
